means: 萧伯纳(1856-1950，英国剧作家、小说家、批评家及社会改革家)，萧伯纳的崇拜者
崇拜萧伯纳的，萧伯纳（风格，作品）的

sentence.Network_en: He startled even his closest friends with Shavian sallies against the smugness of ownership.
sentence.Network_cn: 他用肖伯纳式的俏皮话抨击起所有权造成的自满情绪时甚至使他最亲近的朋友也吃惊.

sentence.Network_en: Much of Shavian drama is constructed around the inversion of a conventional theatrical situation.
sentence.Network_cn: 萧伯纳的许多戏剧情节与角色都在传统的基础上发生倒转错位.

shaver 骗子, shavian 肖伯纳风格的, shavetail 少尉

means.word_mean: 1. an admirer of G. B. Shaw or his works
1. of or relating to George Bernard Shaw or his works
